recipes.title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa in vegetable broth. Let cool. Mix with vegetables, olives, and feta. Whisk olive oil with lemon juice and season. Toss salad with dressing.

recipes.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F. Roll out dough. Spread sauce, add mozzarella. Bake 12-15 minutes. Top with basil, olive oil, and parmesan.

recipes.title: Spinach and Ricotta Stuffed Shells
recipes.instructions: Cook shells. Mix ricotta, spinach, parmesan, eggs, and seasonings. Stuff shells with mixture. Top with marinara and mozzarella. Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Indian Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.instructions: Blend tomatoes, onion, garlic, ginger into paste. Cook paste with spices. Add paneer and cream. Simmer until thick. Garnish with butter and coriander.

recipes.title: Vegan Chocolate Avocado Mousse
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients except berries until smooth and creamy. Chill for 2 hours. Serve topped with fresh berries.

recipes.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.instructions: Roast sweet potato and chickpeas. Cook quinoa. Massage kale with olive oil. Make tahini dressing. Arrange all in bowl and drizzle with dressing.

recipes.title: Vegan Lentil Curry
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and spices. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add lentils and coconut milk. Simmer until lentils are cooked.

recipes.title: Keto Salmon with Asparagus
recipes.instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper. Pan sear 4 minutes per side. Sauté asparagus with garlic and butter. Finish with lemon juice and dill.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo Zucchini Noodles
recipes.instructions: Spiralize zucchini into noodles. Cook chicken and slice. Make alfredo sauce with cream, butter, garlic, and parmesan. Toss everything together.

recipes.title: Keto Avocado Bacon Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook bacon until crispy. Slice avocados and tomatoes. Toss greens with oil and vinegar. Top with bacon, avocado, tomatoes, and blue cheese.

recipes.title: Paleo Grilled Chicken with Sweet Potato
recipes.instructions: Season chicken with herbs and spices. Grill 6-7 minutes per side. Roast sweet potatoes at 400°F for 45 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Paleo Beef and Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat coconut oil in wok. Stir fry beef until cooked. Add vegetables and cook until crisp-tender. Season with coconut aminos, ginger, and garlic.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Chicken Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Coat chicken in egg, then almond flour mixture. Bake at 400°F for 20 minutes. Top with marinara and mozzarella. Bake 5 more minutes.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa and brown turkey with onion. Mix with tomatoes, corn, and seasonings. Stuff peppers and bake at 375°F for 30 minutes. Top with cheese.

recipes.title: Spicy Thai Basil Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in wok. Stir fry garlic and chilies. Add chicken and cook until done. Add sauces and sugar. Stir in basil until wilted. Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Brown beef with taco seasoning. Warm taco shells. Chop vegetables. Assemble tacos with beef, vegetables, cheese, and condiments.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Pork Chops
recipes.instructions: Season pork chops. Sear in hot pan 4 minutes per side. Make sauce with honey, soy sauce, and garlic. Pour over chops and simmer 2 minutes.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Lamb Kebabs
recipes.instructions: Mix lamb with minced onion, garlic, herbs and spices. Form into kebabs. Grill 12-15 minutes turning once. Serve with pita, tzatziki and vegetables.
